mapper.sql: id, question_name, scale_code, `type`, dimension, create_date, update_date
mapper.select:
select id, question_name, scale_code from psyc_question where 1 = 1
and question_name like CONCAT(#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into psyc_question
question_name,
scale_code,
`type`,
dimension,
create_date,
update_date,
#{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scaleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update psyc_question
question_name = #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scale_code = #{scaleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dimension = #{dimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update psyc_question set question_name = #{questionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scale_code = #{scaleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dimension = #{dimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
